response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its market worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of serving you soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
